tasks.label: prisma-migrate-and-generate
tasks.command: cd d:\YourBookSuit\client && npx prisma migrate dev --name add-system-admin-and-subscriptions && npx prisma generate

tasks.label: prisma-migrate-dev
tasks.command: cd client && npx prisma migrate dev --name add_system_admin_and_subscriptions

tasks.label: prisma-generate-crm
tasks.command: cd d:\YourBookSuit\client && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate status

tasks.label: prisma-generate-and-migrate
tasks.command: cd d:\YourBookSuit\client && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate deploy

tasks.label: prisma-migrate-opportunities
tasks.command: cd d:\YourBookSuit\client && npx prisma migrate dev --name enhance_opportunities_pipeline && npx prisma generate

tasks.label: prisma-migrate-opportunities
tasks.command: cd d:\YourBookSuit\client && npx prisma migrate dev --name enhance_opportunities_pipeline

tasks.label: prisma-opp-migrate
tasks.command: cd d:\YourBookSuit\client && npx prisma migrate dev --name enhance_opportunities_pipeline 2>&1 && npx prisma generate 2>&1

tasks.label: migrate-opportunities
tasks.command: cd d:\YourBookSuit\client && npx prisma migrate dev --name enhance_opportunities_pipeline && npx prisma generate

tasks.label: prisma-migrate-hcm
tasks.command: cd d:\YourBookSuit\client && npx prisma migrate dev --name hcm_employee_enhancements && npx prisma generate
